attributes.action: Mr Cameron STOP using polish nation as an example of benefits immigrants !!!
attributes.additional_details: Prime minister Mr Cameron keeps using Poles in medias as an example of immigrants for benefits only. He should STOP doing that as Poles aren't only nation which claims benefits and if they do it is accordingly to EU regulations. We do understand that Mr Cameron is affraid of MUSLIMS, BLACKS, ASIANS and all other nations which can start protesting if he will touch them but please remember that they do claim much much more benefits then all others together. HANDS OFF POLES PLEASE. Thank you very much.
